text: And if EU users can´t click on  "Decline" this can have bad legal implications for businesses as they practically have to accept cookies, which is against GDPR.

Pretty sure the law states that you should _somehow_ inform the user how cookies are used, and that continued use is considered consent (ie. it was never about having these obtrusive banners in particular), but at the very least it’s really bad UX.
"continued use is considered consent" but that is a problem, right? because if they can´t click it, they cant decline that consent

Yeah, and if consent is not given and chat is accessed then chat should ask for consent etc.

It's not surprising there are companies that specialize in providing GDPR compliant consent thingamajigs
do you mean they can leave the site? what kind of solution would that be? "Accept the tracking or leave?"
i think a good solution would be to give the user the option in the Website Settings to choose the postioning of those buttons betwenn center and right aligned
Welp, we have privacy statements where information gathered & its uses are defined. The compliance dialog states that if you decline, we'll only store a cookie stating that you are not to be tracked
You can choose to have the EU consent banner at the top of the page of course as a fix to this issue

yeah that is probably the Solution that HubSpot thought for this problem. I think that it might still be useful to give a bit more flexibility here, so that there is also a solution if people want to have it at the bottom of the page. I feel like that should be possible as well
Can you send test page link <@UU4T3609E>??
I am trying to copy my asset to another account. But it shows this error. How to resolve this issue?
Hello all. Thanks for for forum
Thanks, <@UQERM7BLY>. What’s your take on phone numbers?

I really try to avoid strict validation unless it’s absolutely needed. Phone numbers are an interesting one too because of the variety of different ways people format them (some people add dialling codes, others don’t, some people add brackets, some people group digits)
I’ve never seen that before. Does it work with an normal default hs asset?
No it is just happening with the assets only
